tool_description: Generate German language recipes and recipe images using AI. Extract or search recipes from the web.
name: gustar.io Deutsche Rezepte
title: gustar.io Deutsche Rezepte

api_list.name: AI Recipe Generator
api_list.description: Generates a recipe in German language using AI, based on your query.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gustar-io-deutsche-rezepte.p.rapidapi.com/generateRecipe"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gustar-io-deutsche-rezepte.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: AI Recipe Image Generator
